channel.title: Server ad help plz really need [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey guys im hosting a server its been 2 days i still have only 10 - 15ppl online only i am trying my best advertising but just aint getting any more people can anyone help me?? like what sites other then server status page on moparscaoe im always in 3-4th page... -_- annoying... runelocus nd rune-server .... any other sites and advice on help how to get server with a lot of players... its wasting of money if i fail at this i need help... :(
my website of server is: www.revolutionpkz.net
Hope i look forward to ur advices and help.. thanks.
